cause.description:
The mission of The Citizens Foundation, USA is to support the building of civil society in Pakistan by providing high quality, secular and scientific education for underprivileged children --
IF THE KIDS CANT GET TO THE SCHOOLS TAKE THE SCHOOLS TO THE KIDS
1. Education is the right of every child
2. There is no second chance for the young child
3. Basic education takes place at the right age – or it does not.
cause.mission: eliminate poverty in Pakistan through collective action
cause.name: TCF - Greater than the Sum of its Parts
